titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on ACM.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/10/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duty on 3-(acetoxy)-3-cyanoproply)methyl-phophinicaid, 2- methylproply ester (also known as ACM).
